statements: SELECT * FROM student_profiles;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name FROM student_profiles ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, instructor, schedule_time FROM course_schedules WHERE room_number = '101';
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade FROM academic_records WHERE grade = 'A';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM student_profiles WHERE date_of_birth >= '2000-01-01';
SELECT * FROM student_profiles;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM student_profiles WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT course_name, instructor, schedule_time FROM course_schedules WHERE room_number = '101';
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade FROM academic_records WHERE academic_year = 2021 ORDER BY record_id DESC;
SELECT sp.first_name, cs.course_name, ar.grade FROM academic_records ar JOIN student_profiles sp ON ar.student_id = sp.student_id JOIN course_schedules cs ON ar.course_id = cs.course_id;
SELECT * FROM student_profiles;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM student_profiles WHERE age > 20;
SELECT * FROM course_schedules WHERE instructor = 'John Doe';
SELECT course_id, course_name, schedule_time FROM course_schedules ORDER BY schedule_time DESC;
SELECT course_name, instructor, room_number FROM course_schedules WHERE schedule_time >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM student_profiles WHERE age > 20 ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM student_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM course_schedules WHERE schedule_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01 08:00:00' AND '2022-01-02 16:00:00';
SELECT sp.first_name, cs.course_name, cs.schedule_time FROM student_profiles sp JOIN course_schedules cs ON sp.student_id = cs.course_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_students FROM student_profiles;
SELECT * FROM students
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM students
SELECT student_id, date_of_birth FROM students
SELECT * FROM course_schedules
SELECT course_name, start_date, end_date FROM course_schedules
SELECT * FROM students WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '1995-12-31';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM students ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, start_date, end_date FROM course_schedules WHERE start_date >= '2023-01-01' AND end_date <= '2023-12-31';
SELECT student_id, AVG(grade) AS average_grade FROM academic_records GROUP BY student_id HAVING AVG(grade) > 3.5;

SELECT students.first_name, course_schedules.course_name, academic_records.grade FROM students JOIN academic_records ON students.student_id = academic_records.student_id JOIN course_schedules ON academic_records.course_id = course_schedules.schedule_id WHERE academic_records.grade >= 4.0;
SELECT * FROM student_profiles
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM student_profiles ORDER BY last_name DESC
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM course_schedules WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT student_id, grade FROM academic_records WHERE grade = 'A'
SELECT project_name, description, deadline FROM design_projects ORDER BY deadline ASC
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM student_profiles;
SELECT course_name, instructor, start_date, end_date FROM course_schedules ORDER BY start_date DESC;

SELECT student_profiles.first_name, course_schedules.course_name, academic_records.grade FROM student_profiles JOIN academic_records ON student_profiles.student_id = academic_records.student_id ORDER BY academic_records.grade DESC;

SELECT student_profiles.first_name, student_profiles.major, design_projects.project_name, design_projects.description FROM student_profiles JOIN design_projects ON student_profiles.student_id = design_projects.student_id;

SELECT student_profiles.first_name, course_schedules.course_name, academic_records.grade FROM student_profiles JOIN academic_records ON student_profiles.student_id = academic_records.student_id WHERE academic_records.grade >= 'B';
SELECT * FROM student_profiles;
SELECT student_name, dob FROM student_profiles WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT address FROM student_profiles WHERE student_id = 2;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM course_schedules ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade, semester FROM academic_records WHERE grade = 'A';
SELECT * FROM faculty_profiles ORDER BY faculty_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, dob, address FROM student_profiles WHERE dob >= '1995-01-01';
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM student_profiles JOIN academic_records ON student_profiles.student_id = academic_records.student_id WHERE grade >= 'B';
SELECT faculty_name, specialization FROM faculty_profiles WHERE specialization LIKE '%Science%';
SELECT course_name, instructor_name, schedule_time FROM course_schedules ORDER BY schedule_time ASC;
